nhc_headline: ...FIRST TROPICAL DEPRESSION OF THE EASTERN PACIFIC SEASON FORMS... ...EXPECTED TO BE A SHORT-LIVED SYSTEM...
summary:
...FIRST TROPICAL DEPRESSION OF THE EASTERN PACIFIC SEASON FORMS... ...EXPECTED TO BE A SHORT-LIVED SYSTEM...
 As of 9:00 AM CST Thu Jul 4
 the center of One-E was located near 17.0, -105.9
 with movement NW at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
